text: Jhang City railway station () is located in Jhang city of Punjab province, Pakistan on the Shorkot–Lalamusa Branch Line. This railway station is the stop of only few trains. Jhang Sadar railway station is the principal railway station of the Jhang city. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Jhang District Category:Railway stations on Shorkot–Lalamusa Branch Line
title: Jhang City railway station
